name: Defender of T.O.M.
description:
A tower defense game with a wizard theme. 
Shoot the approaching enemies with spells and survive as many waves as possible!

Basic controlls:

Movement: ZQSD

Left Mouse button: Shoot tower spell

Right Mouse button: Pick turret location
E: Confirm turret summon

Esc: Pause Game

Controlls are also mentioned in game.

Game meant for 1920x1080 resolution.
